EmailTemplate.description: When user access CPQ and license is not allocated
EmailTemplate.name: CPQ License Unavailable Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Apttus CPQ License
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName},
We have raised a case for License request.Kindly wait for the Admin to take action on the case.
In order to track the status of case use this link: {!Case.Id}
Thank you, GF Support
